preqs: Students must have completed 72 credit points.
description: As the world of complex technology expands with innovation requiring global foundations, the need for dynamic entrepreneurs grows. The framework of this unit will provide students with the practical knowledge, skills and tools to utilize entrepreneurship to quickly and efficiently evaluate opportunities to build innovation solutions. This unit will empower students to become the business leaders of the future utilizing practical and logical approaches to bring together entrepreneurship and innovation within a global context.
